_comment: Bed Probe Selection Database - For dropdown selection. See bed-probes-documentation.json for technical details.

probes.name: BLTouch
probes.notes: Most popular probe. Servo-deployed pin. Many clones available (3DTouch). V3.1 recommended.

probes.name: CR Touch
probes.notes: Creality's BLTouch alternative. Metal pin. Stock on Ender 3 S1 series.

probes.name: 3DTouch (BLTouch Clone)
probes.notes: Budget BLTouch clone. Quality varies. TriangleLab versions generally good.

probes.name: PINDA V2
probes.notes: Stock on Prusa MK2.5/MK3/MK3S. Includes temp compensation. Requires metal bed.

probes.name: SuperPINDA
probes.notes: Stock on Prusa MK3S+/Mini. Built-in temp compensation. Requires metal bed.

probes.name: Inductive Sensor (NPN)
probes.notes: Budget option. Requires metal bed. May need voltage divider for 3.3V boards.

probes.name: Capacitive Sensor
probes.notes: Works with any bed material (glass, PEI, etc). Adjustable sensitivity. Temp sensitive.

probes.name: Klicky Probe
probes.notes: Very popular on Voron. Magnetically attached microswitch. Requires dock & macros.

probes.name: Unklicky Probe
probes.notes: Simplified Klicky design. Single printed part. Easier to build.

probes.name: Euclid Probe
probes.notes: Alternative to Klicky with side-mounted dock design.

probes.name: Touch-Mi
probes.notes: Nozzle-operated mechanical probe. No servo needed. Unique deployment method.

probes.name: Sensorless (TMC StallGuard)
probes.notes: Uses motor stall detection. Less accurate. Requires TMC2130/2209/5160 drivers.

probes.name: Beacon Probe
probes.notes: Ultra-fast scanning probe. Eddy current sensor. Primarily for Klipper.

probes.name: Cartographer
probes.notes: High-speed eddy current probe. Similar to Beacon. Klipper-focused.

probes.name: BTT Eddy
probes.notes: BTT's eddy current scanning probe. Newer product. Marlin support in development.

probes.name: Manual Probe (Paper Test)
probes.notes: No hardware needed. LCD-guided paper test at each point.

probes.name: No Probe
probes.notes: Manual bed leveling with springs/knobs only.
